entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
